body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Justin Hayes and I'm with Reliable Auto Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rebecca. Could you please provide me with your phone number so we can follow up on your inquiry?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is six five five, three seven eight, nine zero two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rebecca. I also need your email address for our records. Could you kindly share that with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is r.collins@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rebecca. We'll look into the shipping problem you experienced and get back to you promptly. Is there anything else you'd like to add or ask?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out to us, Rebecca. We value your feedback and will strive to improve our services. Have a great day!
